item.title: yumのインストール可能なバージョンを取得
item.description: --showduplicates オプションを使用 $ yum --showduplicates list httpd | expand Loaded plugins: fastestmirror, langpacks, refresh-packagekit Loading mirror speeds from cached hostfile * fedora: mirror.steadfast.net Available Packages httpd.x86_64 2.4.6-6.fc20 fedora httpd.x86_64 2.4.10-1.fc20 updates How can I instruct yum to install a specific version of package X? - Unix & Linux Stack Exchange
